short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks periodically if there is a new version of Composer. Keep composer hash in your pipelines up to date!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you checking composer hash in your automated pipelines and builds, you wanto to be sure that you update it as soon as new version of composer is released. It notify you each time it detects new version of composer, and display in popup actual hash of composer file.
